title: One action performed to change state of gas

content.question: A sample of a gas is in a container with a movable piston. Only one action is performed to take the gas from state <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> to state <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> via the process shown in the above graph of pressure as a function of volume. Which of the following could be the one action?

choices.label: Gas molecules were removed from the container.
Thermal energy was added to the gas.
The gas was allowed to freely expand.

content.answer: Thermal energy was added to the gas.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
